# regex-for-iranian-mobile-number
# this is for irancell, rightel and hamrah e aval

^[0|+98|\]+[9]+[3|2|1|0|]+[0-9]{8}


support all option like these 

+989372281262
+989202281262
+989122281262
+989022281262

09372281262
09202281262
09122281262
09022281262

9372281262
9202281262
9122281262
9022281262
